com.djammr.westernknights.util.input

Class WKInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.djammr.westernknights.util.input.WKInput
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.controllers.ControllerListener, com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor, InputObservable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    InputMapper

    public class WKInput
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor, com.badlogic.gdx.controllers.ControllerListener, InputObservable
    Implements InputProcessor and ControllerListener for de-cluttering subclasses and implements InputObservable for dispatching translated events
